mapper.select: SELECT A.WO_DT, B.PART_MAIN_COD, B.WO_COD, B.PART_MAIN_NM, B.WO_NM_KOR, A.REST_TIME_SEC, A.SETS, A.REPS, A.WEIGHT, A.VOLUME FROM ICTWORKOUTRECORD A, COMWORKOUTS B WHERE A.PART_MAIN_COD = B.PART_MAIN_COD AND A.WO_COD = B.WO_COD AND A.USR_ID = #{inpUsrId} AND SUBSTR(A.WO_DT,1,6) = #{inpWoDt} ORDER BY A.WO_DT, B.PART_MAIN_COD, B.WO_COD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ICTWORKOUTRECORD(USR_ID, REG_DT, WO_DT, PART_MAIN_COD, WO_COD, REST_TIME_SEC, SETS, REPS, WEIGHT, VOLUME) VALUES(#{usrId}, TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{woDt}, #{partMainCod}, #{woCod}, #{restTimeSec}, #{sets}, #{reps}, #{weight}, #{volume})
